q: photo shows Jamie Oliver as he leaves a taping of ''The Late Show with David Letterman '' in New York. ''We decided to put a halt to it until we receive that proposal,'' said Alaniz. We really don't want to be part of reality TV. The success formula for reality TV is drama and conflict. We're just not interested in either. This serves as a wake-up call. We're not interested in participating in reality TV across the district. We just don't want to go there. A spokeswoman for the network said production on ''Food Revolution'' would continue, though she declined to specifically comment on Jamie Oliver 's ban from Los Angeles schools. '' Simon Cowell desperately wants Cheryl Cole to be a judge but if that's knocked back by Fox chiefs the next option is to start her as a mentor,'' a source tells The Sun. It would be a way to test how she's received in America. Plus viewers would be able to warm to her first, rather than having her thrust upon them by going straight on the panel. Although nothing has been confirmed yet, Simon Cowell revealed his week he'll be making an announcement about the US X Factor in ''two weeks' time''. Follow us on Twitter

the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers. ''We're excited about( Keon Clark ),'' Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Antonio Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplessly as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation. its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice-president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., probably its fiercest rival. Microsoft

While it's ''far too early'' for the congresswoman to speak, Kirsten Gillibrand said, she's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and understand and show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. Gabrielle Giffords began breathing without a ventilator yesterday as doctors took out the breathing tube that had run down Gabrielle Giffords 's throat and replaced it with a tracheotomy tube in her windpipe. When consumers shop more, companies are more aggressive with advertising. The company is focusing more attention on mobile devices with its Android operating system, an area where it competes with Apple for the sale of smartphones and tablets. at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. '' Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do.
